Text.Page:
The popori crave communion with the spirit of the goddess Seren, but they don't realize that a pilgrimage to {@Rgn:30014$$Seren’s Lake} might be the last journey they ever undertake.

Someone capable of safely escorting the pilgrims to the lake must be found.

Is that someone ?

Typical patronizing high elves. We can take care of ourselves!

Tell Centurion Pointy-Ears that I'm a veteran of the Argon War and I can take care of myself!

However, um...I seem to have misplaced my map. Can you show me the way to {@Rgn:30014$$Seren’s Lake}?
Thank you, <PCNAME>. It's like I can hear Seren herself whispering to me.
